name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Well done, honorable PM @narendramodi and @nsitharaman. This monumental economic reform by @PMOIndia and @nsitharamanoffc will undoubtedly spur domestic and foreign investment in India. Skeptics should keep quiet and celebrate this brilliant amendment to the current tax rate.

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Excited to be part of this new and innovative partnership between @ZiplineIndia, @CMOMaharashtra and @Dev_Fadnavis//t.co/mWrpGGxzlE

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Thank you for your kind words @drharshvardhan, it was an honor and a great privilege to have you inaugurate this state-of-the-art vaccine manufacturing facility. With the continued support of @PMOIndia and you, we hope to take great strides in vaccine manufacturing in India.//t.co/UvDKLeQTlK

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: I thank @RCPuneCentral and @EconomicTimes for this recognition and congratulate all the other winners. I hope these awards will encourage more good CSR work and help address the many inequalities, that exist in our country.//t.co/J9aJJfa9pa

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: When you immunize a child, you immunize the society. Participated in @SwasthImmunised campaign with @shreyadhoundial being led by @Network18Group @adarpoonawalla for a #SwasthBharat #VaccinesWork @smritiirani//t.co/GLhFlrb6r1

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Very valid points made by @ShainaNC, let's work together for a 100% immunised future for India @SwasthImmunised @Network18Group #VaccinesWork//t.co/XU53tI5SDD

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Outbreaks such as these, are a grim reminder of what happens when parents don't vaccinate their children and put their lives at risk. This World Immunization Week let's resolve to have an India, that is 100% vaccinated. #WorldImmunizationWeek #VaccinesWork//t.co/uXKkD2ojL0

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Outbreaks such as these, are a grim reminder of what happens when parents don't vaccinate their children and put their lives at risk. This World Immunization Week let's resolve to have an India, that is 100% vaccinated. #WorldImmunizationWeek #VaccinesWork//t.co/uXKkD2ojL0

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: It is time we realise that the choice not to get vaccinated, comes with great risks. This study is a huge step in putting to rest, that vaccination causes autism.//t.co/6ef8VlITcJ @CNN #MMR #Autism

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: It is time we realise that the choice not to get vaccinated, comes with great risks. This study is a huge step in putting to rest, that vaccination causes autism.//t.co/6ef8VlITcJ @CNN #MMR #Autism

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: There is an urgent need to ensure a safer future for those who will make the future of India. It was from this thought, that, Swasth Immunised India was launched in collaboration with @Network18Group & #KareenaKapoorKhan. Click here to know more -//t.co/PvI70p6155//t.co/UOsZLGe0RW

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: It's my pleasure to partner with @Network18Group and my friend #KareenaKapoorKhan to launch Swasth Immunised India, a nation wide campaign to set right, the facts about immunisation and improve india's coverage on vaccines protecting children from birth @narendramodi @PMOIndia//t.co/m4ZAtsMavl

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: I could not agree more @GaviSeth! Just take a look at what is happening in our country, with resistance to vaccine programs in schools and other establishments//t.co/zk7zhyOGh6

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: While the government has done a great job in improving health care across India, we still have a long way to go when it comes to Immunisation. My thoughts and concerns on this, in @EconomicTimes //t.co/9JgAEJvIqp

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: @swatibytes Dear Madam i was not even aware of any signs being put up, upon checking with my team i was told that it was strategically put to deal with certain clashes that were happening with the pmc operationally, and so please discuss this with my ceo krishnan and he can sortout/explain

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Legalise betting on cricket! A great way to bring in tax revenue that can go towards education, infrastructure, support farmers and much more. Won't destroy the moral fabric of India, will help to curb illegal gambling with black money. @juniorbachchan @suhelseth @vikramchandra

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Finally a stylish, practical and effective way to keep the mosquitos away! hopefully will save lives check out my friend Tanveer s new venture//t.co/znbB4iaNHL

text: A sarcastic take & hard to look at, but worth remembering the horrors of past diseases - and those that still kill kids every day//t.co/MJc68dJ7y4 #VaccinesWork

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: If #Budget2018 had provided some relief on the Minimum Alternate Tax (MAT) for SEZ units, it would help abate apprehensions of foreign investors, leading to a larger influx of capital and job opportunities.

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: My feelings about this #Budget2018 are mixed. Peeved about the corporate tax rate not being adjusted to be more competitive with other countries like the U.S. and those in Europe. Just look at how @realDonaldTrump brought down the corporate tax and helped the U.S. economy surge.

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: We have come a long way from our humble beginnings and have a long road ahead of us. Watch the @CleanCityPune story on @CNNnews18 tonight//t.co/vhvrRFYQYy

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Another great ad for @CleanCityPune that highlights the need to keep our world clean, green and litter-free, hope you enjoy it as much as I did. Great work @karanjohar @punitdmalhotra @aliaabhatt @varun_dvn @DharmaTwoPointO #DuniyaHogiClean//t.co/dFJ4CYePmi

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Sir, @narendramodi, It's been a year since you graced us with your presence at @SerumInstIndia , inspiring us to do more with the @CleanCityPune initiative and we hope that inspires more clean and green cities. @PMOIndia//t.co/ojb80SqMhP

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: #lovethearticle @VOGUEIndia @priyatanna @Anaita_Adajania @avigowariker//t.co/fSX5IKb1Nw @adarpoonawalla. Special thank you for helping us with the clean city initiative @karanjohar @punitdmalhotra @Varun_dvn @aliaa08

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Well said @Varun_dvn! India can become truly clean and green only if we all change our behavior and mindsets towards cleanliness, no amount of my machines, or the government machinery can do that alone. #IndiaHogaClean @CleanCityPune//t.co/h4EDTq5yui

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Very true @narendramodi sir, we are emulating that very sentiment in Pune through our @CleanCityPune initiative -//t.co/k8NwFGr7J9//t.co/u0SUHA9u61

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: Unveiling my vision for @SerumInstIndia for the next 5 years. We commit to a healthier world as always//t.co/C6whyLKzS1 @thehindubiz

name: Adar Poonawalla
text: That's great news @drharshvardhan, but we should also look to fast track approvals for Indian companies with proven #Dengue cures.//t.co/m4ryZIGbsi
